channel.title: [317 Delta] Notification Command

item.title: [317 Delta] Notification Command
item.dc:creator: @317_coder 317 coder
item.description:
@317_coder wrote:

I want to make a command that notifies all players of whatever the message is. Kind of like a yell but different. Here is the code:

[CODE]}
if (command.startsWith(“notice”) && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) {

		String text = command.substring(8);
		talk(Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}[/CODE]

I get this error:

Please help me

Read full topic
